home.home_text-3: AWS Cloud Practitioner | Salesforce Administrator | Computer Engineering Student
home.parrafo-info: Welcome! I’m a Junior IT Technician at Tata Consultancy Services, passionate about solving problems and helping people through technology. Here I bring together my experience in Service Desk, Salesforce, and AWS Cloud as I continue to grow in the tech industry.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I’m Facundo Morales — a tech enthusiast constantly learning and evolving in the IT world 
 
 At Tata Consultancy Services, I work as an IT Service Desk Analyst, helping international users solve technical issues across corporate systems. I handle troubleshooting in Windows 11, Office 365, Outlook, OneDrive, and SSO tools like Duo, Zscaler, and Okta, while managing incidents through ServiceNow. 
 
 With a background in Salesforce and AWS Cloud, I bridge technical support and cloud technology to deliver better experiences for users. I’m known for being responsible, adaptable, and always curious — focused on learning, improving, and making technology work for people.

tareas: Intensive training in Salesforce: objects, permissions, and automation.
Hands-on practice with LWC, Apex, and SOQL through guided projects.
Adoption of best practices with Salesforce DX and version control.
Provide technical support in English to international end users.
Troubleshoot Windows 11, Outlook, OneDrive, and drive mapping issues.
Manage access and SSO (Duo, Zscaler), escalation, and ServiceNow documentation.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: You will embark on an epic battle, far from being the conventional game and with plenty of twists and turns
proyectos.info-proyecto2: We provide a tutorial and an example of how to deploy a website using amazon S3.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills and a bit about my background.
proyectos.info-proyecto4: Mass email delivery system using AWS serverless services for automatic scalability.
